title: Development of Critical and Creative Learning Design for Advanced Science Education (K-12)

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic scientific concepts and experience with fundamental research methods
context.additional_context: Strengthening Scientific Research Competencies via Project-Based Collaboration in a Smartphone-Utilized Restricted Technology Environment

learning_goals: Learners can derive three or more research questions by applying critical thinking while analyzing scientific phenomena.
Learners can complete the design of two or more science experiments using creative problem-solving strategies.
Learners can reinterpret scientific problems from a social justice perspective by submitting project outcomes that incorporate peer feedback.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
